mutation CreatePost {
    createPost(
        input: {
            title: "meowwwww"
            media: ["{{new_profile_pic}}", "{{base64_photo1}}","{{base64_photo2}}"]
            mediadescription: "{{invalid_email}}"
            contenttype: image
            tags: ["{{Camelcasetag}}", "{{Lowercasetag}}", "{{Uppercasetag}}"] 
        }
        action: POST  
    ) {
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
        }
         
    }
}

graphql.query:
query ListPosts {
    listPosts(postid: "{{postid}}") {
        status
        counter
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            visibilityStatus
            isHiddenForUsers
            hasActiveReports
            amountreports
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            url
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                visibilityStatus
                isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
                isreported
                isfriend
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                visibilityStatus
                isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                amountreports
                isreported
                isliked
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    visibilityStatus
                    isHiddenForUsers
                    hasActiveReports
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                    isreported
                    isfriend
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

query GetProfile {
    getProfile(userid: "{{w_userid_t2}}") {
        status
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            username
            status
            slug
            img
            biography
            visibilityStatus
            isHiddenForUsers
            hasActiveReports
            isfollowed
            isfollowing
            iFollowThisUser
            thisUserFollowsMe
            isreported
            amountposts
            amounttrending
            amountfollowed
            amountfollower
            amountfriends
            amountblocked
            amountreports
        }
    }
}
